scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener ./contracts/MasterApe.sol > ./contracts-flattened/MasterApe.sol && truffle-flattener ./contracts/SupportApe.sol > ./contracts-flattened/SupportApe.sol && truffle-flattener ./contracts/BananaToken.sol > ./contracts-flattened/BananaToken.sol && truffle-flattener ./contracts/BananaSplitBar.sol > ./contracts-flattened/BananaSplitBar.sol && truffle-flattener ./contracts/Timelock.sol > ./contracts-flattened/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener ./contracts/BNBRewardApe.sol > ./contracts-flattened/BNBRewardApe.sol
scripts.verify:bsc: truffle run verify MonsterChef --network bsc && truffle run verify KaijuToken --network bsc && truffle run verify Timelock --network bsc && truffle run verify Daikaiju --network bsc && truffle run verify MultiCall --network testnet
